archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Service Classes
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description These processes develop new service class ideas. The new service class ideas include an analysis of the customer value proposition. Extended Description Not used for this process element
